PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14372018-11-22,  ,  ,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActCrown Liability and Proceedings Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Crown Liability and Proceedings (Provincial Court) Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CROWN LIABILITY AND PROCEEDINGS (PROVINCIAL COURT) REGULATIONS in order to harmonize the regulation with the PROVINCIAL AND TERRITORIAL private law by the use of a terminology that is consistent with the civil law and common law traditions, in each of the two official languages.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0255 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Crown Liability and Proceedings (Provincial Court) Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
precis: Regulations Amending the CROWN LIABILITY AND PROCEEDINGS (PROVINCIAL COURT) REGULATIONS in order to harmonize the regulation with the PROVINCIAL AND TERRITORIAL private law by the use of a terminology that is consistent with the civil law and common law traditions, in each of the two official languages.
